name: Please Stand By
description:
The warp core's on fire!

Its burnt to a crisp!

You gotta control this ship yourself, Pilot. It was made for our brand new warp technology, but the interns messed up the design. You can only control one tool at a time because of those fools. 

Wait, the specimens there too?

Ok. Feed it some minerals to keep it alive. Looks like the containment units busted.

I know, I know. We'll get you out of there. Just one sec o n n d. d  . . . 

[COMMUNICATIONS LOST]

Controls:

  -WASD + Space to move and jump.

  -E to interact with control panels and minerals.

  -Heal the specimen by beaming some mineral, and depositing it into the upper hatch

Known bug: Enemies can get stuck in the ship if you are on a spawner. Use the shield to repel it and get it out of there.
